item.title: Video: White House Chief of Staff Says Obama Has Complete Power to Decree Healthcare Rules
item.description: Jack Lew, Obama’s Chief of Staff, says Obamacare law gives the President the power make rules regarding your health. Period. [youtube https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NhCxGdTJrxs] Lee Presser’s comment nails it: Chris Wallace states this is precisely the reason why so many people oppose Obamacare. Share this frightening power grab with your friends.
